text: Miss World Spain 2020 was the 8th edition of the Miss World Spain pageant. The winner was Ana García Segundo of Almería and she will represent Spain at Miss World 2021. ==Final results== ===Placements=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size: 95%;" |- ! Final results !
